application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1	Corsican Pine (Pinus nigra maritima)	Using tracked MEWP Raise crown to give 4 m clearance. Remove lowest branch at 7m to west, growing over property to rear. Remove faulted limb at 9m to west, hanging down perpendicular to the ground. Reduce limb at 10m to north, growing over neighbours to side, by 2-3m. Reduce limb at 12m to south, growing towards top of adjacent Silver Birch, by 2-3m. Thin upper crown by 10%. Lightly re shape remaining crown. Remove deadwood and snags. No	Item	Work Description	Tree Protection	Image	Value	Discount	StatusREAR GARDEN		Unknown	Image		Discount	AcceptedT1	Corsican Pine (Pinus nigra maritima)	Using tracked MEWP Raise crown to give 4 m clearance. Remove lowest branch at 7m to west, growing over property to rear. Remove faulted limb at 9m to west, hanging down perpendicular to the ground. Reduce limb at 10m to north, growing over neighbours to side, by 2-3m. Reduce limb at 12m to south, growing towards top of adjacent Silver Birch, by 2-3m. Thin upper crown by 10%. Lightly re shape remaining crown. Remove deadwood and snags. T2	Silver Birch (Betula pendula)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by 2-3m. Final height 8m and spread 4.5m
